name: Klefki
author: yuu
flavor_text: In the past, noble families entrusted their vault keys to a Klefki. They passed the Klefki down through the generations, taking good care of it.

abilities.name: Mischievous Lock
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, Basic Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s) have no Abilities, except for Mischievous Lock.

attacks.name: Joust
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
